Introduction

Shin Dong Hee, better known by his stage name Shindong, is a rapper, singer, dancer, MC, DJ, TV Personality, and video director under Label SJ, a subsidiary of SM Entertainment. He is best known for being a member of the boy group Super Junior.

Fun facts

1
Shindong composed and wrote Pink Fantasy's debut song "Iriwa."
…
2
Shindong has directed many music videos including; Super Junior's "One More Chance", Red Velvet's "Rebirth", Kim Heechul's "Old Movie", Universe Cowards' "Falling Blossoms" and "Hanryang", NCT Mark's "Lemonade Love" and more.
…
3
Shindong's stage name means "Prodigy".
…
4
Shindong has directed most of Pink Fantasy's music videos.
…
5
Shindong served as a choreographer in some of Super Junior's performances.
